biocode.fims.bcid

Class ManageEZID

  • java.lang.Object
    • biocode.fims.bcid.ManageEZID

  • public class ManageEZID
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to work with EZID creation from the Bcid Database. requests to this class are controlled by switches in the Database indicating whether the intention is to create EZIDS for particular identifiers.

      • createBcidsEZIDs

        public void createBcidsEZIDs(EzidService ezid)
                      throws EzidException
        Go through bcids table and create any ezid fields that have yet to be created. This method is meant to be called via a cronjob on the backend.

        TODO: throw a special exception on this method so we can follow up why EZIDs are not being made if that is the case

        Parameters:
        ezid -
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        EzidException
